6.Pros: It is an easy first job. Most everyone is friendly and the tasks given are easy.
6.Cons: Some of the people aren't the greatest to work with and it is hard to deal with some customers at times.

7.Pros: Gain experience working in a fast-paced environment as part of a team. Learn how to hold down a job, and develop the people skills needed for basically every career out there.
7.Cons: Could be quite stressful at times. Didn't always deal with people in their best moods. Some people were better teamplayers than others.

8.Pros: your co workers are friendly , you also will get 40 hrs or more every 2 weeks.
